```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
Stacked_Bar_Graph_Play_Data <- read_excel("Stacked Bar Graph Play Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Masterdata")

plotframe<-Stacked_Bar_Graph_Play_Data%>%
  filter(Bay=="Otter")%>%
  select(GPS_ID,`Dead/Alive`,Open_Canopy_Cover, RHMA__Living_Canopy_Cover,RHMA__Dead_Canopy_Cover,LARA__Living_Canopy_Cover, LARA__Living_Canopy_Cover, AVGE__Living_Canopy_Cover, AVGE__Dead_Canopy_Cover,COER__Living_Canopy_Cover,COER__Dead_Canopy_Cover)


longframe<-plotframe%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=Open_Canopy_Cover:COER__Dead_Canopy_Cover,names_to="Species",values_to = "Percent")


sbplot<-longframe%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=GPS_ID, y=Percent, fill=Species))+
  geom_col(position="stack")

sbplot

```
